summary: This module implements utilities for creating semi‑sorted batches of audio‑text data used in ASR training. It provides a sampler that groups sample indices by length to form batches on demand, calculates the required number of batches, and supports distributed sampling. A convenience function is also supplied to instantiate the sampler with a dataset and batch configuration.
business_intent: Enable more efficient training of automatic speech recognition models by reducing padding overhead and improving GPU utilization through length‑aware batching, especially in multi‑GPU or distributed environments.
